results.title: Medications Modulating the Acid Sphingomyelinase/Ceramide System and 28-Day Mortality among Patients with SARS-CoV-2: An Observational Study
authors: On Behalf Of The Ap-Hp/Université Paris Cité/Inserm Covid-Research Collaboration Ap-Hp Covid Cdr Initiative And Entrepôt de Données de Santé Ap-Hp Consortium
results.text_hl: Observational cohort studies of @<m>DISEASE_COVID_19</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000086382 @@@COVID-19@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ have indicated that FIASMA antidepressants and the FIASMAs @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Hydroxyzine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D006919 @@@hydroxyzine@@@ are associated with a reduced risk of mechanical ventilation or @DISEASE_Death @DISEASE_MESH:D003643 @@@death@@@ in the acute care setting and a decreased risk of hospital or emergency department visits among @SPECIES_9606 @@@outpatients@@@.

results.title: Risk of Acute Infections in New Users of Antihypertensive Drugs: An Observational Cohort Study.
results.text_hl: In 2 pairwise comparisons (@<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ versus @CHEMICAL_Ramipril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017257 @@@ramipril@@@/@CHEMICAL_Bendroflumethiazide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001539 @@@bendroflumethiazide@@@), we followed @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ for as long as they were exposed to compare risk of the primary outcome (acute outpatient @DISEASE_Infections @DISEASE_MESH:D007239 @@@infections@@@ including @DISEASE_Respiratory_Tract_Infections @DISEASE_MESH:D012141 @@@respiratory, genitourinary, gastrointestinal infections@@@, and @DISEASE_Sepsis @DISEASE_MESH:D018805 @@@sepsis@@@) and diagnosed @<m>DISEASE_COVID_19</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000086382 @@@SARS-CoV-2 infections@@@ in 2020/2021 (@<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ versus @CHEMICAL_Ramipril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017257 @@@ramipril@@@).

results.title: Conflicts over calcium and the treatment of COVID-19
results.text_hl: These findings suggest, with indirect evidence, that use of @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ mediates @<m>DISEASE_COVID_19</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000086382 @@@COVID-19@@@ survival.

results.title: Blood pressure control following angiotensin antagonists substitution: insights from a triple-blind, randomized, clinical trial.
results.text_hl: Herein, we present the results of substituting angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibitors (ACEI) or angiotensin receptor blockers (ARB) with the calcium channel blocker @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ with or without the alpha/beta-blocker @CHEMICAL_Carvedilol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077261 @@@carvedilol@@@ to control high blood @DISEASE_Pressure_Ulcer @DISEASE_MESH:D003668 @@@pressure@@@ in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_COVID_19</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000086382 @@@coronavirus disease 2019@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_COVID_19</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000086382 @@@COVID-19@@@).

citations.NLM: Sharifan A, Bahreini M, Ashraf H, Najmeddin F. Blood pressure control following angiotensin antagonists substitution: insights from a triple-blind, randomized, clinical trial. J Clin Pharmacol. 2023 Jun 21;():. PMID: 37341147
